verses.verse: Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H559><s%> to Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>
"This month <S%H2320><s%> shall be to you the beginning <S%H7218><s%> of months. <S%H2320><s%> It shall be the first <S%H7223><s%> month <S%H2320><s%> of the year to you. <S%H8141><s%>

Speak <S%H1696><s%> to all the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> <S%H6218><s%> 'On the tenth day of this month, <S%H2320><s%> they shall take <S%H3947><s%> to them every man <S%H376><s%> a lamb, <S%H7716><s%> according to their fathers <S%H1><s%>' houses, <S%H1004><s%> a lamb <S%H7716><s%> for a household; <S%H1004><s%>

and if the household <S%H1004><s%> is <S%H1961><s%> too little <S%H4591><s%> for a lamb, <S%H7716><s%> then he and his neighbor <S%H7934><s%> next <S%H7138><s%> to his house <S%H1004><s%> shall take <S%H3947><s%> one according to the number <S%H4373><s%> of the souls; <S%H5315><s%> according <S%H6310><s%> to what everyone <S%H376><s%> can eat <S%H400><s%> you shall make your count <S%H3699><s%> for the lamb. <S%H7716><s%>

Your lamb <S%H7716><s%> shall be without blemish, <S%H8549><s%> a male <S%H2145><s%> a <S%H1121><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> old. <S%H3947><s%> You shall take it from the sheep, <S%H3532><s%> or from the goats: <S%H5795><s%>

and you shall keep <S%H4931><s%> it until the fourteenth <S%H702><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> of the same month; <S%H2320><s%> and the whole <S%H3605><s%> assembly <S%H6951><s%> of the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> shall kill <S%H7819><s%> it at <S%H996><s%> evening. <S%H6153><s%>

They shall take <S%H3947><s%> some of the blood, <S%H1818><s%> and put <S%H5414><s%> it on the two <S%H8147><s%> doorposts <S%H4201><s%> and on the lintel, <S%H4947><s%> on the houses <S%H1004><s%> in which they shall eat it. <S%H398><s%>

They shall eat <S%H398><s%> the flesh <S%H1320><s%> in that night, <S%H3915><s%> roasted <S%H6748><s%> with fire, <S%H784><s%> and unleavened bread. <S%H4682><s%> They shall eat <S%H398><s%> it with bitter herbs. <S%H4844><s%>

Don't <S%H398><s%> eat it raw, <S%H4995><s%> nor boiled <S%H1310><s%> at all with water, <S%H4325><s%> but roasted <S%H6748><s%> with fire; <S%H784><s%> with its head, <S%H7218><s%> its legs <S%H3767><s%> and its inner parts. <S%H7130><s%>

You shall let nothing of it remain <S%H3498><s%> until the morning; <S%H1242><s%> but that which remains <S%H3498><s%> of it until the morning <S%H1242><s%> you shall burn <S%H8313><s%> with fire. <S%H784><s%>

This <S%H3602><s%> is how you shall eat <S%H398><s%> it: <S%H2296><s%> with your belt on your waist, <S%H4975><s%> your shoes <S%H5275><s%> on your feet, <S%H7272><s%> and your staff <S%H4731><s%> in your hand; <S%H3027><s%> and you shall eat <S%H398><s%> it in haste: <S%H2649><s%> it is Yahweh <S%H3068><s%>'s Passover. <S%H6453><s%>

For I will go <S%H5674><s%> through the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> in that night, <S%H3915><s%> and will strike <S%H5221><s%> all the firstborn <S%H1060><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> both man <S%H120><s%> and animal. <S%H929><s%> Against all the gods <S%H430><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> I will execute <S%H6213><s%> judgments: <S%H8201><s%> I am Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>

The blood <S%H1818><s%> shall be to you for a token <S%H226><s%> on the houses <S%H1004><s%> where you are: <S%H7200><s%> and when I see the blood, <S%H1818><s%> I will pass <S%H6452><s%> over you, <S%H5063><s%> and there shall no plague be on you to destroy <S%H4889><s%> you, <S%H5221><s%> when I strike the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>

This day <S%H3117><s%> shall be to you for a memorial, <S%H2146><s%> and you shall keep <S%H2287><s%> it a feast <S%H2282><s%> to Yahweh: <S%H3068><s%> throughout your generations <S%H1755><s%> you shall keep it a feast <S%H2287><s%> by an ordinance <S%H2708><s%> forever. <S%H5769><s%>

<S%H7651><s%>"'Seven days <S%H3117><s%> you shall eat <S%H398><s%> unleavened bread; <S%H4682><s%> even <S%H389><s%> the first <S%H7223><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> you shall put away <S%H7673><s%> yeast <S%H7603><s%> out of your houses, <S%H1004><s%> for whoever eats <S%H398><s%> leavened bread <S%H2557><s%> from the first <S%H7223><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> until the seventh <S%H7637><s%> day, <S%H3117><s%> that soul <S%H5315><s%> shall be cut <S%H3772><s%> off from Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

In the first <S%H7223><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> there shall be to you a holy <S%H6944><s%> convocation, <S%H4744><s%> and in the seventh <S%H7637><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> a holy <S%H6944><s%> convocation; <S%H4744><s%> no kind of work <S%H4399><s%> shall be done <S%H6213><s%> in them, <S%H389><s%> except that which every man <S%H5315><s%> must eat, <S%H398><s%> that only may be done by you. <S%H6213><s%>

You shall observe <S%H8104><s%> the feast of unleavened bread; <S%H4682><s%> for in this same <S%H6106><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> have I brought <S%H3318><s%> your armies <S%H6635><s%> out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt: <S%H4714><s%> therefore you shall observe <S%H8104><s%> this day <S%H3117><s%> throughout your generations <S%H1755><s%> by an ordinance <S%H2708><s%> forever. <S%H5769><s%>

In the first <S%H7223><s%> month, <S%H6240><s%> on the fourteenth day <S%H3117><s%> of the month <S%H2320><s%> at evening, <S%H6153><s%> you shall eat <S%H398><s%> unleavened bread, <S%H4682><s%> until the twenty <S%H6242><s%> first <S%H259><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> of the month <S%H2320><s%> at evening. <S%H6153><s%>

There shall be no yeast <S%H7603><s%> found <S%H4672><s%> in your houses <S%H1004><s%> for seven <S%H7651><s%> days, <S%H3117><s%> for whoever eats <S%H398><s%> that which is leavened, <S%H2556><s%> that soul <S%H5315><s%> shall be cut off <S%H3772><s%> from the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> whether he be a foreigner, <S%H1616><s%> or one who is born <S%H249><s%> in the land. <S%H776><s%>
You shall eat <S%H398><s%> nothing leavened. <S%H2556><s%> In all your habitations <S%H4186><s%> you shall eat <S%H398><s%> unleavened bread. <S%H4682><s%>'"

Then Moses <S%H4872><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> for all the elders <S%H2205><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to them, <S%H4900><s%> "Draw out, and take <S%H3947><s%> lambs <S%H6629><s%> according to your families, <S%H4940><s%> and kill <S%H7819><s%> the Passover. <S%H6453><s%>

You shall take <S%H3947><s%> a bunch <S%H92><s%> of hyssop, <S%H231><s%> and dip <S%H2881><s%> it in the blood <S%H1818><s%> that is in the basin, <S%H5592><s%> and strike <S%H5060><s%> the lintel <S%H4947><s%> and the two <S%H8147><s%> doorposts <S%H4201><s%> with the blood <S%H1818><s%> that is in the basin; <S%H5592><s%> and none <S%H376><s%> of you shall go out <S%H3318><s%> of the door <S%H6607><s%> of his house <S%H1004><s%> until the morning. <S%H1242><s%>

For Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> will pass through <S%H5674><s%> to strike <S%H5062><s%> the Egyptians; <S%H4714><s%> and when he sees <S%H7200><s%> the blood <S%H1818><s%> on the lintel, <S%H4947><s%> and on the two <S%H8147><s%> doorposts, <S%H4201><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> will pass over <S%H6452><s%> the door, <S%H6607><s%> and will not allow <S%H5414><s%> the destroyer <S%H7843><s%> to come <S%H935><s%> in to your houses <S%H1004><s%> to strike you. <S%H5062><s%>
You shall observe <S%H8104><s%> this thing <S%H1697><s%> for an ordinance <S%H2706><s%> to you and to your sons <S%H1121><s%> forever. <S%H5769><s%>

It shall happen when you have come <S%H935><s%> to the land <S%H776><s%> which Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> will give <S%H5414><s%> you, <S%H1696><s%> according as he has promised, that you shall keep <S%H8104><s%> this service. <S%H5656><s%>
It will happen, <S%H1121><s%> when your children ask <S%H559><s%> you, <S%H5656><s%> 'What do you mean by this service?'

that you shall say, <S%H559><s%> <S%H2077><s%> 'It is the sacrifice of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%>'s Passover, <S%H6453><s%> who passed <S%H6452><s%> over the houses <S%H1004><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> in Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> when he struck <S%H5062><s%> the Egyptians, <S%H4714><s%> and spared <S%H5337><s%> our houses. <S%H1004><s%>'" The people <S%H5971><s%> bowed their heads <S%H6915><s%> and worshiped. <S%H7812><s%>

The children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> went <S%H3212><s%> and did <S%H6213><s%> so; <S%H3068><s%> as Yahweh had commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron, <S%H175><s%> so they did. <S%H6213><s%>

It happened at midnight, <S%H2677><s%> that Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> struck <S%H5221><s%> all the firstborn <S%H1060><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> from the firstborn <S%H1060><s%> of Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> who sat <S%H3427><s%> on his throne <S%H3678><s%> to the firstborn <S%H1060><s%> of the captive <S%H7628><s%> who was in the dungeon; <S%H1004><s%> and all the firstborn <S%H1060><s%> of livestock. <S%H929><s%>

Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> rose up <S%H6965><s%> in the night, <S%H3915><s%> he, <S%H5650><s%> and all his servants, and all the Egyptians; <S%H4714><s%> and there was a great <S%H1419><s%> cry <S%H6818><s%> in Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> for there was not a house <S%H1004><s%> where there was not one dead. <S%H4191><s%>

He called <S%H7121><s%> for Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> by night, <S%H3915><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> "Rise up, <S%H6965><s%> get out <S%H3318><s%> from among <S%H8432><s%> my people, <S%H5971><s%> both you and the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel; <S%H3478><s%> and go, <S%H3212><s%> serve <S%H5647><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> as you have said! <S%H1696><s%>
Take <S%H3947><s%> both your flocks <S%H6629><s%> and your herds, <S%H1241><s%> as you have said, <S%H1696><s%> and be gone; <S%H3212><s%> and bless me also! <S%H1288><s%>"

The Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> were urgent <S%H2388><s%> with the people, <S%H5971><s%> to send <S%H7971><s%> them out of the land <S%H776><s%> in haste, <S%H4116><s%> for they said, <S%H559><s%> "We are all dead men. <S%H4191><s%>"

The people <S%H5971><s%> took <S%H5375><s%> their dough <S%H1217><s%> before it was leavened, <S%H2556><s%> their kneading troughs <S%H4863><s%> being bound up <S%H6887><s%> in their clothes <S%H8071><s%> on their shoulders. <S%H7926><s%>

The children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> according to the word <S%H1697><s%> of Moses; <S%H4872><s%> and they asked <S%H7592><s%> of the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> jewels <S%H3627><s%> of silver, <S%H3701><s%> and jewels <S%H3627><s%> of gold, <S%H2091><s%> and clothing. <S%H8071><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> favor <S%H2580><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of the Egyptians, <S%H4714><s%> so that they let them have <S%H7592><s%> what they asked. <S%H5337><s%> They despoiled the Egyptians. <S%H4714><s%>

The children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> traveled <S%H5265><s%> from Rameses <S%H7486><s%> to Succoth, <S%H5523><s%> about six <S%H8337><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> on foot <S%H7273><s%> who were men, <S%H1397><s%> besides <S%H905><s%> children. <S%H2945><s%>

A mixed <S%H6154><s%> multitude <S%H7227><s%> went up <S%H5927><s%> also with them, <S%H6629><s%> with flocks, herds, <S%H1241><s%> and even very <S%H3966><s%> much <S%H3515><s%> livestock. <S%H4735><s%>

They baked <S%H644><s%> unleavened <S%H4682><s%> cakes <S%H5692><s%> of the dough <S%H1217><s%> which they brought out <S%H3318><s%> of Egypt; <S%H4714><s%> for it wasn't <S%H2556><s%> leavened, because they were thrust out <S%H1644><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> and couldn't <S%H3201><s%> wait, <S%H4102><s%> neither had they prepared <S%H6213><s%> for themselves any food. <S%H6720><s%>

Now the time <S%H4186><s%> that the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> lived <S%H3427><s%> in Egypt <S%H4714><s%> was four <S%H702><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> thirty <S%H7970><s%> years. <S%H8141><s%>

It happened at the end <S%H7093><s%> of four <S%H702><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> thirty <S%H7970><s%> years, <S%H8141><s%> even the same <S%H6106><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> it happened, <S%H6635><s%> that all the armies of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> went out <S%H3318><s%> from the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>

It is a night <S%H3915><s%> to be much observed <S%H8107><s%> to Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> for bringing <S%H3318><s%> them out from the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%> This is that night <S%H3915><s%> of Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> to be much observed <S%H8107><s%> of all the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> throughout their generations. <S%H1755><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron, <S%H175><s%> "This is the ordinance <S%H2708><s%> of the Passover. <S%H6453><s%> No foreigner <S%H1121><s%> shall eat of it, <S%H398><s%>
but every man <S%H376><s%>'s servant <S%H5650><s%> who is bought <S%H4736><s%> for money, <S%H3701><s%> when you have circumcised <S%H4135><s%> him, <S%H398><s%> then shall he eat of it.
A foreigner <S%H8453><s%> and a hired servant <S%H7916><s%> shall not eat of it. <S%H398><s%>

In one <S%H259><s%> house <S%H1004><s%> shall it be eaten; <S%H398><s%> you shall not carry out <S%H3318><s%> anything of the flesh <S%H1320><s%> abroad <S%H2351><s%> out of the house; <S%H1004><s%> neither shall you break <S%H7665><s%> a bone of it. <S%H6106><s%>
All the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> shall keep it. <S%H6213><s%>

When a stranger <S%H1616><s%> shall live as a foreigner <S%H1616><s%> with you, <S%H6213><s%> and will keep the Passover <S%H6453><s%> to Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> let all his males <S%H2145><s%> be circumcised, <S%H4135><s%> and then let him come near <S%H7126><s%> and keep <S%H6213><s%> it; <S%H249><s%> and he shall be as one who is born in the land: <S%H776><s%> but no uncircumcised person <S%H6189><s%> shall eat of it. <S%H398><s%>
One <S%H259><s%> law <S%H8451><s%> shall be to him who is born <S%H249><s%> at home, <S%H1616><s%> and to the stranger who lives as a foreigner <S%H1481><s%> among you. <S%H8432><s%>"
All the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> so. <S%H3068><s%> As Yahweh commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron, <S%H175><s%> so they did. <S%H6213><s%>

It happened the same <S%H6106><s%> day, <S%H3117><s%> that Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> brought <S%H3318><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> by their armies. <S%H6635><s%>
